link.script: /* Required settings - you MUST set */ var BASEURL = "https://go.oracle.com/LP=104313"; /* This URL should be the CURRENT PAGE URL */ var LPid = "104313"; /* the ID of this landing page */ var redirURL = "https://go.oracle.com/LP=104315"; /* The URL that will be redirected to after a form submit (thank you page) */ var elqCampaignId = "124071"; /* Eloqua Campaign ID */ var cmid = ""; /* GCM Campaign ID */ var submitText = "Register"; /* The text that appears in the submit button */ var formType = "Progressive"; /* "8", "progressive". default is progressive. */ var thankYouEmail = "0"; /* "1","2","3", etc. Determines which auto-responder to send. Default is none. */ var formHtmlName = "systemprogprof"; /* make SURE the form has the correct fields and fieldnames */ var language_value="en-us"; var onDemandPP="Yes"; var isSurvey="No"; var CompanySize="No"; var formStyle="0"; /* "0", "1". " 0 - with label, 1 - without label"*/ var contactMeFlag="No"; /* "Yes", "No". makes contact me field mandatory */ var contactMeText="Yes, I would like to be contacted by an Oracle Solution representative."; var customFieldFlag = "No"; var businessEmail = "No"; if(customFieldFlag == "Yes"){ var customFieldLabel="Tell us a little more about your requirements."; var customFieldMandatory="No"; /* "Yes", "No". makes custom question mandatory */ } else{ var customFieldLabel=""; var customFieldMandatory="No"; /* "Yes", "No". makes custom question mandatory */ }

/* merge variables must be in the HTML landing page, not the external JS ... DO NOT TOUCH */ var assetHash = "1Xb478"; /* for now this is universal for all LPs so do not modify */ var serverVal = ""; var serverContactInfo = ""; var serverCountry = ""; var serverFirst = ""; var serverLast = "";

var formURL = "https://go.oracle.com/LP=103972"; /* This URL should be the WELCOME PAGE URL */ var elqCampaignId = ""; /* Eloqua Campaign ID */ var shareTrackingParams = "&src1=:ow:lp:sh:em:::Newsletter_Subscription&intcmp=WWMK171102P00015:ow:lp:sh:em:::Newsletter_Subscription"; /* Share tracking params */ var SocialShareUrl = formURL + "?elqCampaignId=" + elqCampaignId + shareTrackingParams; var fileURL = ""; var mailto = "mailto:?subject=Thought this might interest you: #SHARETITLE#&body=I thought you might be interested in this: #SHARETITLE# #NEW_LINE##NEW_LINE#You can view it at, #SHAREWCURL#";

div.div: Emails are sent even if you have unsubscribed from other Oracle communications. To unsubscribe from a newsletter, click the Unsubscribe link at the bottom of the newsletter.
